abstract.p: One hundred sixty-six recently published monographs treat critical theory: specifically semiotics, narratology, rhetoric, and language systems; structuralism and deconstruction; feminism; psychoanalytic criticism; historical criticism; post-modernist criticism; reader-response criticism; and phenomin enological criticism.
